2.Description: Write a program that reads an integer from the standard input and outputs "odd" or "even" depending on whether the integer is an odd number or not.
2.Name: Even or Odd

3.Description: Reads a integer from standard input and outputs "greater" if the number is greater than 50 "lesser" otherwise.
3.Name: Is greater than 50

1.Description: Write a program that outputs YES if the  input  string  is a palindrome , NO otherwise.
1.Name: Is Palindrome
